title: Trulia Real Estate & Rentals
description:
Finding a home where you can be you has never been easier, more beautiful, or intuitive. Discover your perfect home through immersive photos and explore neighborhood info with maps that show crime, top-rated schools, and local amenities. Save, narrow, and share your favorite homes with friends and family, or contact an agent – plus get instant alerts when new homes you might like hit the market. With Trulia searching for a home for sale or rent is a cinch. “One of the best Android apps for finding a house to buy, place to rent or to simply browse local real estate information." – Best Android Apps Review

Key Features:
✓ Maps: Using built-in GPS, see nearby homes for sale, houses for rent, apartments for rent or recently sold homes.
✓ Photo slideshows: View slideshows of homes, condos, townhomes, apartments and more.
✓ Instant Updates: Get notified immediately when new home listings come up in your favorite areas or there are status updates to your saved homes.
✓ Custom Searches: Filter your search by price, lot size, number of bedrooms and bathrooms, neighborhood, and more. 
✓ Keyword Searches: Search for listings using keywords or MLS numbers.
✓ Voice Search: Ask Google to search for homes on Trulia using nothing but your voice.
✓ Collections: Swipe through collections of homes and discover new properties in a beautiful, intuitive way.
✓ Open Houses: Find open houses for sale near you, and easily add them to your calendar.
✓ Local Scoop: See school ratings and nearby amenities like restaurants, grocery stores, gas stations and more.
✓ Crime Maps: See a crime map of any neighborhood in the US.
✓ Map Modes: View a map area in normal, satellite or terrain mode. 
✓ Mortgage Calculator: Get personalized rates and calculate your mortgage.
✓ Affordability Breakdown: Calculate the full cost of owning your dream home, including mortgage, homeowner’s insurance, and property taxes
✓ Connect with nearby devices to share your favorite homes instantly.
✓ Cross-device Access: Log in to access your favorite searches and properties across all your devices.
✓ Connect w/ Realtors: Quickly contact relevant real estate agents about listings.
✓ Directions: Get directions to open houses, homes for sale, or apartments for rent.
✓ More listings! We now support for sale by owner listings
✓ Boards: The simple way to organize, narrow, and share your favorite homes.
✓ Android Wear Optimized: get home alerts, view property details and photos, or contact the realtor — all from your watch. 
✓ Trulia Widget: See new homes for sale, right from your home screen.
✓ Samsung Air View: Hover your finger - or S-pen - on a property listing to see property details (only available on Samsung GALAXY Note I, Note II, Note 8.0 and 10.1, and Samsung GALAXY S4).

We'd love to hear your feedback! Email us anytime: android@trulia.com
short_desc: Real estate app to easily find listings of homes for sale or apartments for rent
what_is_new:
• Updated a few things so your device doesn't have to work so hard.
Tip: Don't miss out on your perfect home - save a search and we'll let you know when new homes hit the market that meet your criteria.
Keep the feedback coming! Email us anytime at android@trulia.com.
